## Description {#details}

Common base class for representing values projected from a statepoint.

Currently, the only projections available are gc.result and gc.relocate.

Definition at line 1778 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>.

### getStatepoint() {#a6cffcfabac72ca61185ea24c1208b937}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Value &#42; GCProjectionInst::getStatepoint () const</>}>
The statepoint with which this gc.relocate is associated.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h/#l01798">1798</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/intrinsicinst-cpp/#l00842">842</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/intrinsicinst-cpp">IntrinsicInst.cpp</a>.

### isTiedToInvoke() {#a9977194165b85f4c1271d6a077d59e6b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::GCProjectionInst::isTiedToInvoke () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if this relocate is tied to the invoke statepoint.

This includes relocates which are on the unwinding path.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h/#l01791">1791</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>.
